entry.title: Tuesday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning. Rain mixed with light snow beginning in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
